comment.author: 43419416@N03
comment._content: The only thing I have to say is, it`s a good thing they aren't concerned with their weight.

comment.author: 58616218@N08
comment._content: I recognise the little girl who climbed onto and into the sundae. She now lives in Oregon under an assumed name. Her enthusiasm for confections has not  abated even after all these years.
